text: (Mu ichindu ya) pa duniya ni ku Akhera. Soni niakum'busya ya wawina. Jilani: “Kwajilanyichisya wanganyao iwele yambone, nambo naga n'di m'bwanganyichilene nao (mpaka iwe yambonepe) ngati achalongo achimijenu, soni Allah akummanyilila nkuwatanganya ni nkwilanya, sano Allah angasache akankandapachisye (malamusi), chisimu Allah ni Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwalunda lwakusokoka.”
